REGISTER.WRONG_USERNAME_FORMAT: Invalid username format, must include letters and numbers, 8 - 25 character
REGISTER.WRONG_PASSWORD_FORMAT: Invalid password format, must include letters and numbers, 8 - 25 character

LOGIN.WRONG_PASSWORD_FORMAT: Invalid password format, must include letters and numbers 8 - 25 character

RBAC.WRONG_ROLE_FORMAT: Invalid role name format. Role name must be alphanumeric and between 4 and 255 characters long

VERIFY_ACCOUNT.INVALID_OTP_CODE_FORMAT: Invalid OTP code format. OTP code must be a 6-digit number

USER.WRONG_DISPLAY_NAME_FORMAT: Display name format is wrong. Only alphanumeric characters are allowed, and the length must be between 8 to 50 characters
USER.WRONG_HIDDEN_FIELDS_FORMAT: Hidden fields format is wrong. Only alphanumeric and comma characters are allowed, and the length must be 2 characters or more
USER.WRONG_FIRSTNAME_FORMAT: First name format is wrong. Only alphabet and space characters are allowed, and the length must be between 1 to 50 characters
USER.WRONG_LASTNAME_FORMAT: Last name format is wrong. Only alphabet and space characters are allowed, and the length must be between 1 to 50 characters

CATEGORY.WRONG_NAME_FORMAT: Category name format is wrong. Only alphanumeric characters are allowed, and the length must be between 8 to 255 characters
CATEGORY.PRIORITY_SHORT: Category priority is too low. Must be 0 or higher
CATEGORY.PARENT_MUST_BE_UUID: Parent category identifier must be a valid UUID
CATEGORY.DESCRIPTION_LONG: Category description is too long. Maximum length is 2000 characters

COURSE.WRONG_COURSE_FORMAT: Course title format is wrong. Only alphanumeric characters and -_!: are allowed, and the length must be between 8 to 500 characters
COURSE.PRICE_MIN: Course price must be 0 or higher
COURSE.PREREQUISITE.MIN: Prerequisites must be at least 8 characters long
COURSE.OBJECTIVE.MIN: Objective must be at least 8 characters long
COURSE.DESCRIPTION.MIN: Description must be at least 8 characters long
COURSE.MUST_BE_UUID: Each category must be a valid UUID
COURSE.WRONG_PAYMENT_METHOD_ID_TYPE: Payment method ID must be a valid UUID
COURSE.WRONG_COURSE_ID: Course ID must be a valid UUID

LECTURE.WRONG_TITLE_FORMAT: Lecture title format is wrong. Only alphanumeric characters and -_!: are allowed, and the length must be between 8 to 500 characters
LECTURE.SECTION_ID_INVALID: Section ID must be a valid UUID
LECTURE.INVALID_LECTURE_ID: Each lecture ID must be a valid UUID

SECTION.WRONG_SECTION_FORMAT: Section title format is wrong. Only alphanumeric characters and -_!: are allowed, and the length must be between 3 to 500 characters
SECTION.WRONG_OBJECTIVE_FORMAT: Section objective format is wrong. Only alphanumeric characters and -_!: are allowed, and the length must be between 3 to 500 characters
SECTION.WRONG_COURSE_ID: Course ID must be a valid UUID
